On 2/19/2022 at 1:54 PM, themaster401 said:

Added auto exposure and eye adaptation TUFX effects. Now you should be able to see your craft in all its glory under low light.

First, thanks for making and sharing AVP.

Now, my issue: the default TUFX profile bundled with AVP isn't giving me good low light results. The night side of Kerbin is almost black except for city lights. That might be realistic but vessels are too dark for playability. I have yet to find my own settings that look reasonably good for both day and night. I therefore need to switch settings every 180 degrees around Kerbin which is cumbersome and immersion-breaking.

I'm experimenting with TUFX but it has so many settings that I don't know where to concentrate. Profiles that worked well for me in KSRSS and JNSQ are not working as well with AVP. Even stock ambient light seems to work differently than I'm used to; I have to crank it so high on the night side that the day side becomes washed out.

Can you or anyone else recommend TUFX tweaks or other graphic settings that work reasonably well in varied light?
If i had to guess never ending paid beta of volumetric clouds,is what keeps this visual mod at halt with update progress
How can i use the volumetric auroras ?

On 4/15/2024 at 3:56 PM, Iapetus7342 said:

Is the skybox optional?

Yep. If you delete the AVP_Skybox folder it should go back to whatever you had before.

Edited April 22 by Horizons Aerospace
forgot to quote

23 minutes ago, Horizons Aerospace said:

Yep. If you delete the AVP_Skybox folder it should go back to whatever you had before.

cool

Hey. I haven't played in some time. I installed AVP but something seems off/different from last time I played (maybe something it's missing and I can't tell).  I think I remember it looking closer to the demo video. Do these pictures look like AVP is working to you?

Hi, this seemed like a good place to ask, if not here scatterer maybe but my in game lens flares look a bit underwhelming and i cant figure out if its a mod ive missconfigured or is missing
ive messed with a few configs but ive had this issue from the start
also mod list if it helps?
